FTP_Transfer.MainDesc: This function enables to transfer files as FTP-Client to a FTP-Server.
FTP_Transfer.FTP_Function: Function that has to be performed on the FTP-Server: Upload will save a new file on the FTP-Server Download will get a new file from the FTP-Server and save it locally
FTP_Transfer.LocalFolder: Local Folder where to save/load the file
FTP_Transfer.LocalFile: Loacal File Name of the transfered file
FTP_Transfer.FileType: File Type can be ASCII or Binary
FTP_Transfer.Result: Result of the process can be "Pass" or "Fail"
FTP_Transfer.ResultText: ResultText will hold the error message if the transfer failed
